itunes:summary:
Special Agent Bruce Sackman, author of “Behind the Murder Curtain: Special Agent Bruce Sackman Hunts Doctors and Nurses Who Kill Our Veterans”, talks about investigating and catching serial killers working as doctors and nurses who killed their patients at VA hospitals, including Dr. Michael Swango a.k.a. “Dr. Death” nurse Kristen Gilbert, known as the “Angel of Death”.

Go to Babbel.com and use promo code DRINKINBROS for an extra 3 months free.
